name: The Last Day of Pompeii
description:
Apocalypse. Catastrophe. Mount Vesuvius erupts. You are an ordinary citizen of ancient Rome and your task is to survive. And help save as many people as possible.

Your life and the life of people depends only on you.

Developers:
Game design - Sergey Reshetnikov - https://astrosoftworks.itch.io/
Programming - Sergey Sergeev - https://sergeev-sergey99.itch.io/
Graphics - Anna Kolupaeva - https://anya-may.itch.io/

Music: 
1) Against Time by Shane Ivers. - https://www.silvermansound.com
2) Old Forest by Finval. - https://tunetank.com/track/3oe/old-forest/
